akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 683(a), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 519

akn:content.akn:p:
§§ 2827, 2828. Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 683(a), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 519
Section 2827, Pub. L. 88–452, title II, § 234, as added Pub. L. 92–424, § 16, Sept. 19, 1972, 86 Stat. 695, related to special assistance for projects.
Section 2828, Pub. L. 88–452, title II, § 235, as added Pub. L. 93–644, § 5(f), Jan. 4, 1975, 88 Stat. 2296; amended Pub. L. 94–341, § 2(a)(13), July 6, 1976, 90 Stat. 804; Pub. L. 95–568, § 17(a)(12), Nov. 2, 1978, 92 Stat. 2440, related to demonstration community partnership agreements.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Oct. 1, 1981, see section 9912(a) of this title, prior to the general amendment of chapter 106 (§ 9901 et seq.) of this title by Pub. L. 105–285.
